key_risks: Litigation exposure from intellectual property and patent infringement lawsuits
Integration challenges from aggressive acquisition strategy
Intense competition from major players in EIM and ECM markets
Data privacy and security risks due to regulatory complexities
Dependence on key strategic partnerships and long-term contracts
controversies: $27.5 million settlement related to Carbonite acquisition
Ongoing legal disputes such as *Open Text Corporation et al. v. Hyland Software, Inc.* and *Trend Micro Inc. v. Open Text, Inc.*
social_issues: Data privacy and security concerns impacting customer trust
governance_issues: ESG risks related to data security and litigation controversies
Potential governance challenges in M&A due diligence and integration
